ruleText: IF Soil Moisture is DRY AND Temperature is HOT THEN Water Duration is LONG WEIGHT 1.0
IF Soil Moisture is WET THEN Water Duration is SHORT WEIGHT 1.0
IF Rain Forecast is HEAVY THEN Water Duration is SHORT WEIGHT 0.9
IF Rain Forecast is LIGHT AND Soil Moisture is DRY THEN Water Duration is MEDIUM WEIGHT 0.7
IF Temperature is WARM AND Soil Moisture is NORMAL OR Rain Forecast is LIGHT THEN Water Duration is MEDIUM WEIGHT 0.75
IF Soil Moisture is DRY OR Temperature is HOT AND Rain Forecast is NONE THEN Water Duration is LONG WEIGHT 0.95
IF Temperature is COLD OR Rain Forecast is HEAVY THEN Water Duration is SHORT WEIGHT 0.6
If Soil Moisture is Wet and Rain Forecast is Heavy or Temperature is Cold then Water Duration is Short
IF Soil Moisture is NOT WET AND Rain Forecast is NONE THEN Water Duration is LONG WEIGHT 0.85

id: IF Soil Moisture is not Wet AND Rain Forecast is not Heavy OR Temperature is not Cold THEN Water Duration is not Short
ruleText: IF Soil Moisture is not Wet AND Rain Forecast is not Heavy OR Temperature is not Cold THEN Water Duration is not Short
